title: Qrix
enter-content: Enter the content of the Bar Code
enter-content-qr: Enter the content of the QR Code
generate-barcode: Generate different types of Bar Codes using Qrix.
generate-qrcode: Generate QR Codes easily and quickly within a click.
history-empty: The history is empty. When you generate Bar Codes or QR Codes, you will see them appear here.
history-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to erase the history? This action cannot be canceled.
reset-settings-msg: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This operation cannot be canceled.
barcode-placeholder: The Bar Code will appear here.
qr-placeholder: The QR Code will appear here.
default-format: Set the default file format when saving a Bar Code or QR Code.
welcome-msg: Qrix is a simple yet powerful Bar Code and QR Code generator. Click on a link below to get started.
